about_the_game:
In Dire Dungeon, you and up to three friends take on the roles of brave adventurers tasked by the King to recover priceless treasures from ancient, abandoned castles and dungeons. Each dungeon is procedurally generated, offering a unique experience every time, filled with deadly traps, horrifying creatures, and hidden riches.

Choose from a variety of classes, each with unique abilities and tools to aid in your survival. Work together to outwit your foes and overcome the dungeon's many dangers. Use proximity voice chat to communicate with your team, warn them of incoming threats, or simply panic together as you’re chased by relentless enemies.

But be warned—these dungeons are as unpredictable as they are perilous. Monsters grow more aggressive, traps become deadlier, and escape routes close off as time ticks away. Teamwork is essential as you gather loot and make your way back to the King's court with your spoils.

From mystical treasures to cursed artifacts, every run offers new challenges and rewards. Will you survive the night and return with riches, or will the dungeon claim yet another victim? Test your courage, cooperation, and cunning in Dire Dungeon!

Features:

  • 4-player online coop + proximity voice chat

  • randomly generated dungeons

  • different classes with various advantages

  • sell founded loot to buy usefull or not so usefull stuff

  • creatures that love hunt you

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 2.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 ti or AMD R9 380
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.0 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 ti or AMD RX 470
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

short_description: A co-op horror adventure set in a fantasy world where up to 4 players explore procedurally generated castles and dungeons, scavenging treasures for the King. Beware of traps, and what else might lurk in the shadows.
